input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Carolina Pine Garland"
Reference Product Description:
This Carolina Pine garland features mixed bristle and cashmere branch tips and is trimmed with pine cones. It is pre-strung with 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This indoor, outdoor garland can be displayed over doors, windows, fireplace mantels, fence or stairway railings.

Designed with a Norwood Fir branch base, this pre-lit artificial Christmas garland is 9 feet long and decorated with pine cones.
Features 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
Suitable as an indoor or outdoor Christmas decoration, drape this garland over any door, window or entryway to add a festive feel to any area of the house.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials and hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this garland is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='Balsam Hill Peak Holiday Garland Set of 2'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Classic Blue Spruce Traditional Green Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='6ft Pre-Lit Artificial Lighted Norfolk Pine Garland with Multi-Color Lights'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Northlight 9' x 12" Pre-Lit Dakota Red Pine Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 9' Spruce Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Northlight 9' x 10" Pre-Lit Oregon Cashmere Pine Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='National Tree Company Full Prelit Garland'
  - Name='National Tree Company Carolina Pine Slim Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 9 Ft Carolina Pine Slim Tree with Clear Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company Pine Garland with Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Feel Real Colonial Garland'
  - Name='National Tree Company Tinkham Pine Garland with LED Lights'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Peak Holiday Garland Set of 2
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Also a garland product, likely similar function but differs by brand and possibly construction/design details; set of 2 suggests quantity difference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Classic Blue Spruce Traditional Green Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a full artificial Christmas tree, not a garland, quite different product type despite holiday decoration similarity.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 6ft Pre-Lit Artificial Lighted Norfolk Pine Garland with Multi-Color Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar garland type with lights and pine construction, but shorter length, different pine variety, and multi-color lights not warm white.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar pre-lit garland product; lacking specific branch type or construction details but matches in function and lighting.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 9' x 12" Pre-Lit Dakota Red Pine Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar length and garland type including pre-lit feature; differs in pine variety but overall close product category.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 9' Spruce Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Appropriate length and garland type; spruce instead of pine and no mention of lights lowers relevancy slightly.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 9' x 10" Pre-Lit Oregon Cashmere Pine Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Highly relevant; same approximate length, pre-lit, cashmere pine variety closely aligned with reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Full Prelit Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Generic pre-lit garland from same brand; very likely comparable construction and use to reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Carolina Pine Slim Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different product silhouette - a slim artificial tree, not a garland, though same branch type.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 9 Ft Carolina Pine Slim Tree with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar length and branch type but is a slim tree, different form and use than garland.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Pine Garland with Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very similar product: brand, pine garland, includes lights; likely nearly identical in purpose and design.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Feel Real Colonial Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Garland product from same brand with 'Feel Real' design implication; possibly different branch type or style but similar intended use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Tinkham Pine Garland with LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Garland with pine and LED lights from same brand; different pine variety (Tinkham vs Carolina) but very similar features and function.
